title: Who is the most talented female English singer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mariah carey Her powerful voice ,dynamics and range is enough for      making her a great singer,she is a songwriter and her songs are a masterpeice. along with 18 number ones worldwide,she's worlds most inspiring singer.Her magical Whistle notes can easily distinct herself from others.
